https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5zHhlRlpEFnaLsbh4CF8X7av79Z.jpg Explore the life of William Randolph Hearst, the pioneering media mogul and inspiration for Orson Welles’ "Citizen Kane." Wielding unprecedented power, Hearst forever transformed the media’s role in American life and politics. Citizen Hearst
